name: DOT | Monetize Polls & Quizzes
author: DOT

sections.description:
Dot for WordPress: The completely free revenue and engagement boosting plugin.

Dot is the easy to use platform to create and publish interactive polls and quizzes, with fully integrated monetization.

Dot is specifically designed for WordPress Publishers looking to increase or diversify their revenue.

Publishers such as Motion Today, The Money Tribune and MMA India have used Dot to increase on site Engagement 5X, grow Reader Time 2X and Ad Revenue 3X.

Dot is fully compatible with Google AMP, Mobile, and Desktop channels.

For more information about the Dot Platform visit https://dotaudiences.com.

REVENUE

  • Grow revenue with a fully integrated connection to premium monetization networks.
  • Server to server header-bidding built-in.
  • Excellent viewability with lazy loading.
  • An extra revenue stream, does not replace any of your existing ad partners.

ENGAGEMENT

  • Craft beautiful and engaging polls and quizzes.
  • 1.8 million + royalty free images and graphics included.
  • All content looks completely native to your site. Include your site logo and colour scheme within every poll and quiz.
  • Social sharing boosted. Your readers can share any poll and quiz directly to their social media in one click.

ANALYTICS

  • Understand your readers better with the complete Dot Analytics suite.
  • See all poll and quiz results, engagement time, number of clicks and more.

FULL SUPPORT

  • Full email support via hello@dotaudiences.com
  • Free live chat assistance at dotaudiences.com to guide you through the setup.
  • We then offer continued support to ensure your revenue and reader engagement is consistently higher with Dot.

MORE INFORMATION

  • Dot Help Centre
  • Dot Publisher Portal
  • Privacy Policy
  • Terms & Conditions
sections.installation:
INSTALL FROM WORDPRESS

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘DOT | Monetize Polls & Quizzes”
  3. Activate it from your Plugins page.
  4. Open the plugin and create an account.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

  1. Download the .zip file from this page
  2. Enter your WordPress admin page
  3. Visit Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin and select the .zip file
  4. Go to your plugins page and activate ‘DOT | Monetize Polls & Quizzes’.
  5. Open the plugin and create an account.
sections.changelog:
1.0.17

  • Added error logging to admin front end

1.0.16

  • Fixed images not showing in admin

1.0.15

  • Reworked the way before/after content placements are rendered.

1.0.14

  • Fixed content rendering for non paragraph and image blocks with new content position options

1.0.13

  • Added new before content and after content position options

1.0.12

  • Added compatibility with AMP for WordPress plugin

1.0.11

  • Tweaked internal code documentation

1.0.10

  • Resolved AMP rendering issues with Official AMP plugin

1.0.9

  • Reverted the_content hook for render_block to prevent issues with post_content additions

1.0.8

  • Fixed placement order issue

1.0.7

  • Fixed render priority clash with amp plugin

1.0.6

  • Now using the_content hook instead of render_block hook to render widgets to fix AMP compatibility

1.0.5

  • Added cache reset functionality for popular cache plugins

1.0.4

  • Now resetting post cache when saving or deleting placements

1.0.3

  • Tweaked placement render logic to be less prone to external plugin block usage

1.0.2

  • Stopped placement renderer from triggering when block rendering outside wp loop

1.0.1

  • Added explicit output for unrecognised types

1.0

  • First Release

short_description: The easiest way to create and publish interactive polls and quizzes from the Dot Platform. Fully integrated monetization and analytics.
